ta.title: ඇල්ලේ බස් අනතුරින් දෙදෙනෙක් මරුට
body_lines: எலா - வெல்லவயா சாலையில் நடந்த விபத்தில் இரண்டு நபர்கள் கொல்லப்பட்டனர், மேலும் 12 பேர் காயமடைந்தனர்.
කෙසේ වෙතත් අප වාර්තාකරුවන් පැවසූවේ තුවාලකරුවන් සංඛ්‍යාව තවත් ඉහළ යා හැකි බවය.
எலாவில் ஒரு சுற்றுலாவுடன் டங்கல்லே நகர்ப்புற கவுன்சிலின் ஊழியர்கள் குழு

en.title: Two killed in bus accident
body_lines: Two persons were killed and another 12 wounded in the crash at the Ella - Wellawaya road.
However, our correspondents said that the number of injured could be increased.
The bus has reached the precipice of the 24 km of the 24 km of the Ella-Wellawaya road, and the bus has reached the precipice.
A group of staff members of the Tangalle Urban Council with a picnic at Ella
